mapper.select: SELECT C.C_IDX, W.W_NAME , S.S_NAME, C.C_COUNT, WL.W_PRICE, U.U_NO, C.C_COUNT * WL.W_PRICE AS C_ALLPRICE, WL.WL_IDX FROM CART C LEFT JOIN WINE W ON C.W_NO = W.W_NO LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON C.WL_IDX = WL.WL_IDX LEFT JOIN STORE S ON C.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN TUSER U ON C.U_NO = U.U_NO WHERE U.U_NO = #{u_no}

SELECT C.C_IDX, W.W_NAME, S.S_NAME, C.C_COUNT, WL.W_PRICE, U.U_NO, S.S_NO, C.C_COUNT * WL.W_PRICE AS C_ALLPRICE, W.W_NO, WL.WL_IDX FROM CART C LEFT JOIN WINE W ON C.W_NO = W.W_NO LEFT JOIN WINELIST WL ON C.WL_IDX = WL.WL_IDX LEFT JOIN STORE S ON C.S_NO = S.S_NO LEFT JOIN TUSER U ON C.U_NO = U.U_NO WHERE U.U_NO = #{u_no}
#{digit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART ( C_IDX, W_NO, S_NO, C_COUNT, U_NO, WL_IDX) VALUES ( (SELECT (NVL(MAX(C_IDX), 0) + 1) FROM CART), #{w_no}, #{s_no}, #{c_count}, #{u_no}, #{wl_idx} )
INSERT INTO SALESHISTORY (PAYNUM, U_NO, S_NO, SH_DATE, P_ALLPRICE, W_NO, WL_IDX ) SELCT #{paynum}, #{u_no}, #{s_no}, SYSDATE, #{p_allprice}, #{w_no}, #{wl_idx})
mapper.select: SELECT W.W_NAME, W.W_LOCATION, W.W_KIND, W.W_VINTAGE, WL.W_AMOUNT, WL.W_PRICE, S.S_NAME, WL.WL_IDX, S.S_NO, W.W_NO FROM WINELIST WL LEFT JOIN WINE W ON WL.W_NO = W.W_NO LEFT JOIN STORE S ON S.S_NO = WL.S_NO WHERE S.S_NO = #{s_no} AND W.W_NO = #{w_no} AND WL.WL_IDX = #{wl_idx}
